name: The Cartoon Kitchen: Kale with Raisins and Pine Nuts
description: This week's Cartoon Kitchen features Serious Eats' cartoonist in residence Larry Gonick's spin on kale. —Ed Levine...

recipeInstructions.text: In a little olive oil, sauté the pine nuts and raisins quickly, until nuts begin to brown. Remove from pan.
Add another dollop of oil and the kale. Sauté over high heat, turning occasionally until well wilted.
Return nuts and raisins to pan; stir well; salt to taste. Serve.
